Thanks
======

  I would like to express my sincerest thanks to the people and organizations
  below (in no particular order), without which this project would not be what
  it is.

  — Krys Lawrence

- Guido van Rossum <guido at python org> (Python)
- Ian Bicking <ianb at colorstudy com> (virtualenv)
- Tarek Ziadé <tarek at ziade org> (distribute)
- The fellowship of the packaging <distutils-sig at python org> (distribute)
- Phillip J. Eby <distutils-sig at python org> (setuptools)
- Sridhar Ratnakumar <srid at nearfar org> (modern-package-template)
- Richard M. Stallman <rms at gnu org> (Free software, GNU/Linux, GPL)
